programmes.show_description: American Matthew VanDyke returns to Libya to help rebel friends fight against Qaddafi forces, but he's captured and held in solitary confinement for nearly six months.
When a drug dealer infiltrates a biker gang for a million-dollar payout, he's pulled into a horrific murder hit. Facing life behind bars, he has no choice but to go undercover.
...Dealer. Drug dealer Davon Mayer is arrested by two cops who want him to sell drugs for their profit. Davon soon finds himself enslaved by the corrupt cops' greed.
New York teen John Alite starts running errands for mobsters, becoming a Mafia hitman for John Gotti. But when the house of cards tumbles, John must choose between family and the Mob.
Teleshopping.
Shop by phone from the comfort of your home.
Award winning eFOLDi lightweight electric folding mobility scooters.
Shop JML, the home for clever ideas.
Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals to ensure your next cruise holiday is your greatest one!
Documentary series following the crews who keep Britain moving when a big freeze strikes.
A seven car motorway pile-up leaves a local council's waste truck in trouble. Fluff does his best to shift one of the heaviest loads his vehicle can lift.
A huge lorry straddling the central reservation of the M1 is a rush-hour headache for Steve and his colleague Pat, and Jim gets drenched as he risks life and limb.
Richo owns a fleet of monster trucks that he has to get halfway across the continent to the middle of the desert.
Steve Grahame is preparing for an epic journey: a 3,000km trek to the top of Western Australia.
Documentary series following truckers in Australia. Mark King has to haul a monster rig to a coal mine 700km away. Steve Grahame is stuck just 70km from his destination.
Dougal Brett's road trains have to haul 1,500 cattle to a market nearly 3,000km away.
A team of truckers, husband and wife Mark and Clare Bolitho, bring their 16-year-old dog all the way to Adelaide; tensions rise at a Perth freight depot.
Classic western starring Joan Crawford and Sterling Hayden. A woman saloon keeper hires an old flame, once a feared gunfighter, to fend off a powerful neighbour. (1954)
A daily round-up of showbiz news and gossip from around the world, focusing on celebrities, movies, music and entertainment.

Frontier adventure based on the true story of a bounty hunter, hired to tackle rustlers, whose unorthodox methods stir up trouble in a ranching community.

Action thriller with Liam Neeson. A family man's life is turned upside down after the mysterious death of his son, as he goes from upstanding citizen to vigilante in pursuit of justice. (2019)

In the face of oncoming traffic, Wagga Truck Towing has to remove a heavily laden rolled B-Double that's shut down a major highway.
Clayton's towing is under pressure to salvage a washed up yacht without it falling apart on a pristine Queensland beach.
Parks Towing takes on a steep incline to remove a truck that has crashed into an embankment. North Coast Towing are called out to Tumlong to clear a burnt out trailer.
Wagga Truck Towing battle impending rain to retrieve a twenty-two tonne cattle truck that's rolled off a waterlogged farm track.

Officers give high-speed pursuit to a van with cloned plates which smashes through traffic near Leeds, and on the A1 a driver claims a mechanical fault caused him to crash.
First up in this action-packed episode, after a tram-stop robbery in Bulwell, the Interceptors are on the hunt for two suspects allegedly armed with a gun.
This episode opens in epic style with a 20-mile cross border pursuit. The suspect heads onto the M1 motorway, weaving all over the shop, at over 120 miles per hour.
Joel McCrea, Randolph Scott and Mariette Hartley star as a group who try to steal gold from a mine in the state of New Mexico. (1962)

Western starring Burt Lancaster. A Mexican-American sheriff is deceived into killing an innocent man. Desperate to repent his mistake, he seeks revenge and helps the man's pregnant widow. (1971)

Western starring Burt Lancaster. A Mexican-American sheriff is deceived into killing an innocent man. Desperate to repent his mistake, he seeks revenge and helps the man's pregnant widow. (1971)
A dilapidated 19-tonne canal boat needs transporting 111 miles to Caversham in Oxfordshire, and a decommissioned passenger jet presents unusual challenges.
In North Yorkshire, more than 1,000 drink drivers are arrested every year. On one busy road, officers search for a car reportedly swerving on a dual carriageway, and set a trap.
Jacko is forced to draw his taser, leading to a shocking result. Liam Sewell discovers a new type of herbal pizza topping.
Traffic chaos in the Tyne Tunnel, and shocking driving as a car reverses down a slip road with an unlicensed driver at the wheel who hasn't even taken his test.
Damo is involved in a high speed pursuit, but the driver gives him the slip. The interceptors' eye in the sky then spots five runners from a crash.
A huge lumber spill leaves Jamie's crew struggling. Jamie heads to Tennessee to collect their delayed custom Rotator - a state of the art heavy rescue truck.
Series with driving experts reacting to dash-cam footage from the UK and worldwide, including lorries losing their loads and Californian drivers distracted by a rocket launch. (Ep1)
Gangster-turned-informer Kenji Gallo risks all to bring down a New York Mafia boss by working for the FBI.
